game.name: USFIV: Complete Shadoloo Pack (2011)
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Balrog, Sagat, Vega, M. Bison and Seth are included in this pack. Don these threads and take down all of your rivals in style!
